title: Joshua Tree National Park: Things To Do
body: Things To Do                   Explore the Park at a Ranger Program               Enjoy Dark Night Skies               World Class Rock Climbing and Bouldering               A Photographer's Paradise               More Than 250 Species of Birds               Wildflowers Color the Landscape in Spring            Joshua Tree National Park welcomes everyone. Recreational opportunities range in terms of effort and skill required, but this beautiful desert park is sure to catch your interest. Whether you're planning your first visit to a national park or your fiftieth, here are some ideas for activities you may enjoy on your trip.         Backcountry Roads  Hiking  Photography   Backpacking  Horseback Riding  Ranger Programs   Birding  Keys Ranch Tour  Rock Climbing   Camping  Mountain Biking  Stargazing   Geology Motor Tour  Nature Walks  Wildflower Viewing
